Discover Bvlgari summer gifts:

node.text:
Watch as @lucia_silvestri takes you on a journey of color. In this video, the Bvlgari Creative Director invites you into the world of the Magnifica collection — giving you an exclusive look at some vibrant gemstones and dreamlike jewels.
.
.
Video by: @spkmore 
Music @guazzonemarco 
Cover by @monsieurtok 
Galleria images:
Director @tommaso.ottomano / DOP @mrcodepa / Production @studio.april 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.text:
Like a portal into a fantastical world, the architecture of the Eternal City gives our muses a gateway into a dreamlike Rome. Watch as @lilyaldridge, @zendaya, @vittoria, and @lalalalisa_m describe what it was like to peer into the wonder of Magnifica and create Bvlgari’s ethereal Brand Campaign film.
.
.
Director & photographer: @txemayeste
Starring #Lisa #Zendaya #LilyAldridge #VittoriaCeretti for Bvlgari
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #DreamMagnificence #LifeIsMagnificent

node.text:
In this brief look behind the scenes we take you from Italy’s capital to its fashion capital. Inside the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II, watch as every second of the show is planned out and meticulously brought to life, celebrating the film’s true stars — the Magnifica High Jewelry collection. 
.
.
Production company @illmatic_film_group_company 
Executive producer @jacopo.pica 
Directed by @gooooooooooooooooooooofy
Producer @annaliasilecchia 
Photographer (cover) @gabrieldelachapelle 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry  #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.title: 'Magnifica' Opera d’Arte — From Rome to Milan.

node.text:
The vibrant inspiration of Rome returns to lift the hearts of the world. Shining into Italy’s fashion capital like a blinding ray of sunshine, Bvlgari presents its most exquisite High Jewelry collection to date. More than the launch of unparalleled works of jewelry craft, this is a resplendent celebration of rebirth. Honored through magnificent muses, music, and Milan, Bvlgari unveils the Magnifica High Jewelry collection at the heart of the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II.
.
.
Models: @vittoria, @lilyaldridge @heconghc, @solangesmith and @blesnyaminher 
Special Guests: @andreabocelliofficial @beatricevenezi 
.
.
Project by @oma.eu
Director @tommaso.ottomano
DOP @mrcodepa
Stylist @sagliogeraldine (studio) @alicegentilucci (galleria)
Music @guazzonemarco 
Production @studio.april
. 
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #Milan

node.text:
With two career GRAMMY nominations, seven studio albums, and nearly 3bn streams to his name, this live DJ set from @steveaoki promises to be spectacular. To celebrate the launch of the Bvlgari Aluminium Steve Aoki Special Edition watch, Bvlgari presents Steve Aoki live. Enjoy.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariAluminium #SteveAoki #LiveConcert #SpecialGuestDJ

node.text:
In honor of the awards, @luxurylaw lays down the law on styling and jewelry for the Oscars. Known as the Image Architect, the fiercely talented super-stylist breaks down how he gets stars like @zendaya red carpet ready. This masterclass also gives you an up-close look at some stunning Bvlgari High Jewelry creations – including the exclusive Magnifica pieces Law used to create Zendaya’s jewelry story for this year's Academy Awards. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #93rdAcademyAwards #AcademyAwards #TheOscars #StarsInBvlgari

node.title: MASTERCLASS BY BVLGARI WITH LAW ROACH

node.text:
To our inspiration. To our incredible home. To the city of countless ancient adventures. To the city of the new stories yet to be lived and told. Celebrate the eternal city allure through the pages of “Bvlgari Roma: Travel Tales for Beauty Lovers” a one-of-a-kind guide to Rome’s renowned glamour.

Happy birthday Rome!

Directed by @oliverhl 
Aerial @snils @gianmarco.gabriele 
Music @federicoderoni 

#Bvlgari #Heritage #History #Roma #NataleDiRoma

node.text:
Unlocking the secrets of Serpenti.
The Bvlgari Watches Creative Director unravels the mystery of this breathtaking High Jewelry watch – the Serpenti Misteriosi Cleopatra. Listen as Fabrizio Buonamassa describes the intricacies of designing a watch within a pure High Jewelry piece, the sheer number of gemstones set into its hexagonal scales, and the unique way this intriguing Bvlgari creation fastens around the wrist. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #BvlgariHighJewelry #Serpenti #SerpentiMisteriosiCleopatra #ColorTreasures #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.text:
A perfect synergy of creative energies.
Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, discusses working with internationally renowned architect, @tadao.ando. Together, they created a timepiece that harmonizes a Japanese expression of the nature of time with uniquely Italian codes of design.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #TadaoAndoLimitedSeries #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

Watch as Lucia shows you dazzling Paraiba tourmaline gems and the breathtaking High Jewelry creations Bvlgari crafts then into. 

#Bvlgari #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariColorJourneys #Paraiba  #Masterclass

node.text:
With every record-breaking year, Bvlgari advances its expertise in the design and manufacture of Haute Horology timepieces. Listen as Bvlgari Watches Creative Director, Fabrizio Buonamassa, shares his thoughts on the past triumphs of the Octo Finissimo collection – and what the new perpetual calendar means for the evolution of the saga.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariWatches #OctoFinissimo #EsteticaDellaMeccanica #WatchesAndWonders2021

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on July 31, 2021. May be an image of jewelry.

node.text:
Building on eternity.
Finding endless inspiration in its Roman heritage, Bvlgari crafts these B.zero1 rings in 18 kt white gold. The Maison adds the eternal symbol of the diamond to its iconic spiral motif — which itself represents harmony between past, present, and future. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on July 31, 2021. May be an image of jewelry and text.

node.text:
Grand designs. 
Boldness is dynamic. The ancient Roman energy of the Colosseum’s design lives on in the new chain of this B.zero1 Rock necklace. Bvlgari also adds a touch of edge to the grandeur of this yellow gold studded pendant — setting its edges with striking pavé diamonds. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #Bzero1 #MagnificentSummer #BvlgariSummer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on July 30, 2021. May be an image of jewelry.

node.text:
The Baroque esthetic, reborn as jewelry.
Translating the Baroque era’s spiral motif into an opulent necklace requires technical prowess and a mastery of colored gemstones. After crafting the spiraling levels of this necklace’s rose gold hardware, the artisan sets a variety of gems individually, tilting them to achieve the piece’s 3D effect. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.text:
A celebration of magnificent muses. 
Each of these Bvlgari Magnifica High Jewelry necklaces turns the dream of Rome into a celebration of magnificent women. @serenayss basks in the Serpenti Metamorphosis, @ester_exposito is adorned by the Fluid Rubellite, @tinakunakey sports the Pink Pleats, @mirimeo brandishes the Aquamarine Foam and @svetlana_khodchenkova wears this Fiorever High Jewelry piece.
.
.
Photographer: @gabrieldelachapelle
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.text:
Crafting metamorphosis.
Featuring detachable elements, the Bvlgari Ruby Metamorphosis necklace is a triumph of ingenuity and craftsmanship. Watch as the artisan’s hands create this Magnifica High Jewelry masterpiece — which transforms into a sautoir, choker, and brooch.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.text:
Watch as @lucia_silvestri takes you on a journey of color. In this video, the Bvlgari Creative Director invites you into the world of the Magnifica collection — giving you an exclusive look at some vibrant gemstones and dreamlike jewels.
.
.
Video by: @spkmore 
Music @guazzonemarco 
Cover by @monsieurtok 
Galleria images:
Director @tommaso.ottomano / DOP @mrcodepa / Production @studio.april 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on July 28, 2021. May be an image of jewelry.

node.text:
Magnificent sinuosity.
The enigmatic emblem makes its ultimate High Jewelry transformation as this sinuous Serpenti Metamorphosis necklace. Carrying a precious 21.06 ct of red-fuchsia rubellite, the mythical snake shimmers with diamonds and the added intrigue of black onyx scales.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #SerpentiHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by BVLGARI Official on July 28, 2021 tagging @eizagonzalez. May be an image of 1 person and jewelry.

node.text:
A rising star hits another crescendo. 
Bvlgari is proud to announce actor and singer @eizagonzalez into the family as Brand Ambassador. Debuting in style, Eiza is adorned by the emblem’s iconic embrace. The Bvlgari Magnifica Serpenti Crescendo necklace alternates diamonds and emeralds, culminating in this incredible 26.10 ct cabochon emerald.
Welcome Eiza! 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #SerpentiHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on July 27, 2021. May be an image of jewelry.

node.text:
Inspired by a Roman fantasy. 
The Bvlgari Magnifica Flower Fantasy is a celebration of bamboo’s natural beauty — as seen through the eyes of the Roman jeweler. Elevating the Divas’ Dream motif with malachite and chrysoprase leaves, the pendant showcases a 29.77 ct exuberant cabochon rubellite.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.text:
Drawing with gems.
Like a colorful Baroque artwork, Bvlgari draws with gems. In this film featuring Bvlgari Creative Director @lucia_silvestri, watch as the Maison’s artisans craft the precious hardware and perfectly set each gemstone — taking the Magnifica Baroque Spiral necklace from sketch to reality.
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica #Craftsmanship

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by BVLGARI Official on July 26, 2021. May be an image of jewelry.

node.text:
Magnifica’s Hidden Treasure.
Through passion and creativity, Bvlgari pushes the limits of jewelry craft. The aptly named Hidden Treasures necklace holds a unique surprise. Each of the drop-shaped, briolette cut gemstones can be removed and worn as off-set earrings. 
.
.
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by BVLGARI Official on July 26, 2021 tagging @blesnyaminher. May be an image of 1 person and jewelry.

node.text:
The delight of Magnifica.
@blesnyaminher experiences the elation of Magnifica, the High Jewelry collection inspired by Bvlgari’s magnificent dream of Rome. Our muse exudes sheer delight wearing Le Magnifiche — a platinum necklace crafted to worship a 10.02 ct cushion ruby.
.
.
Photographer @hugocomte
Stylist @sagliogeraldine 
.
#Bvlgari #BvlgariJewelry #BvlgariHighJewelry #BvlgariMagnifica
